electrify.name: Electrify
electrify.desc: Shock yourself and apply Amped for 15s. Can be used while Carried to escape.

amplified reflexes.name: Amplified Reflexes
amplified reflexes.desc: Amped now grants enhanced speed and parkour, but triples the self-damage on use and doubles its cooldown.

amplified rage.name: Amplified Rage
amplified rage.desc: Amped now grants you an additional +10% weapon damage.
